documents.content:
# California CSLB Class C Specialty Licenses (2026)

## 42 Specialty Contractor Classifications

Class C licenses allow contractors to perform specialized trades. Each requires trade-specific examination and experience.

### Mechanical & HVAC
- **C-4** - Boiler, Hot Water Heating and Steam Fitting
- **C-20** - HVAC (Warm-Air Heating, Ventilating, Air Conditioning)
- **C-38** - Refrigeration

### Electrical & Low Voltage
- **C-7** - Low Voltage Systems
- **C-10** - Electrical (requires 32 CE hours via DIR)
- **C-28** - Lock and Security Equipment

### Structural & Building
- **C-5** - Framing and Rough Carpentry
- **C-6** - Cabinet, Millwork and Finish Carpentry
- **C-8** - Concrete
- **C-9** - Drywall
- **C-17** - Glazing
- **C-21** - Building Moving/Demolition
- **C-29** - Masonry
- **C-35** - Lathing and Plastering
- **C-43** - Sheet Metal
- **C-50** - Reinforcing Steel
- **C-51** - Structural Steel

### Site Work & Infrastructure
- **C-12** - Earthwork and Paving
- **C-27** - Landscaping
- **C-31** - Construction Zone Traffic Control
- **C-32** - Parking and Highway Improvement
- **C-34** - Pipeline
- **C-42** - Sanitation System
- **C-57** - Well Drilling (B license cannot perform)

### Specialty Finishes
- **C-2** - Insulation and Acoustical
- **C-13** - Fencing
- **C-15** - Flooring and Floor Covering
- **C-23** - Ornamental Metal
- **C-33** - Painting and Decorating
- **C-45** - Sign
- **C-54** - Ceramic and Mosaic Tile

### Plumbing & Water
- **C-36** - Plumbing
- **C-53** - Swimming Pool
- **C-55** - Water Conditioning

### Specialized
- **C-11** - Elevator
- **C-16** - Fire Protection (B license cannot perform)
- **C-22** - Asbestos Abatement (workers comp always required)
- **C-39** - Roofing (workers comp always required)
- **C-46** - Solar
- **C-47** - General Manufactured Housing
- **C-49** - Tree Service (Tree and Palm)
- **C-60** - Welding
- **C-61** - Limited Specialty (various sub-classifications)

### Official URL
https://www.cslb.ca.gov/about_us/library/licensing_classifications/
